translations.Do you want to add the remote share {nam: 你想要添加远程共享 {名称} 来自 {所属}@{远程}?
translations.Server to server sharing is not enabled: 此服务器未启用服务器到服务器分享功能
无法建立一个远程分享
translations.Couldn't establish a federated share, ma: 无法建立分享，可能密码是错误的。
translations.Federated Share request was successful,: 联合共享请求已成功，您将会收到邀请信息，请检查您的通知。
translations.The mountpoint name contains invalid cha: 挂载点的名称包含无效字符。
translations.Not allowed to create a federated share: 不允许与所有者创建联合共享.
translations.Invalid or untrusted SSL certificate: 无效或是不被信任的 SSL 证书
translations.Could not authenticate to remote share,: 无法验证远程共享，可能是密码错误
translations.Sharing %s failed, because this item is: 共享 %s 失败，因为它已经共享给 %s
translations.Not allowed to create a federated share: 不能给你自己分享文件
translations.Sharing %s failed, could not find %s, ma: 共享 %s 失败, 无法找到 %s, 可能该服务器当前无法访问或者使用自签名证书.
translations.You received \"%3$s\" as a remote share: 你得到“%3$s"做为远程分享从”%1$s（代替"%2$s）
translations.You received {share} as a remote share f: 你得到[共享]是从[用户]做为远程共享（代替原来的）
translations.You received \"%3$s\" as a remote share: 你从“%1$s"得到"%3$s"做为远程共享
translations.You received {share} as a remote share f: 您从 {user} 收到了 {share} 作为远程共享
translations.Share with me through my #Nextcloud Fede: 通过我的联合云ID，分享给我，看%s
通过我的#Nextcloud联合云ID与我共享
translations.Allow users on this server to send share: 允许用户分享文件给其他服务器上的用户
translations.Allow users on this server to receive sh: 允许用户从其他服务器接收分享
translations.Search global and public address book fo: 在全局和公开地址簿中寻找用户
translations.Sharing %s failed, could not find %s, ma: 共享 %s 失败，联合云无法找到 %s，请检查设置或联系管理员。
translations.You received \"/%3$s\" as a remote share: 你接收到 "/%3$s"  做为远程共享来自于 %1$s (代表 %2$s)
你接收到 "/%3$s"  做为远程共享来自于 %1$s
